set.xpath: /items/item/effect_group[((starts-with(@name, 'gun')) or (starts-with(@name, 'tarkov'))) and not ((starts-with(@name, 'gunExplosives')) or (starts-with(@name, 'gunBow')) or (starts-with(@name, 'gunBot')) or ((contains(@name, 'gun')) and (contains(@name, 'Parts'))))]/passive_effect[@name='ModSlots']/@value

append.xpath: /items/item[starts-with(@name, 'gun') and ./property[@name='Tags' and not(contains(@value, 'shotgun'))] and not(@name='gunm32a1mgl') and not(@name='gunfn40gl') and not(@name='gunchinalake')]

set.xpath: /items/item/effect_group[((starts-with(@name, 'gun')) or (starts-with(@name, 'tarkov'))) and not ((starts-with(@name, 'gunExplosives')) or (starts-with(@name, 'gunBow')) or ((contains(@name, 'gun')) and (contains(@name, 'Parts'))))]/passive_effect[@name='ModSlots']/@value

append.xpath: /items/item[(starts-with(@name, 'gun')) and not (@name='gunstm9') and not (@name='gunmpx') and not (@name='gunmp9') and not (@name='gunuziprosmg') and not (@name='gunmp7') and not (@name='gunsr2mveresk') and not (@name='gunak300velociraptor') and not (@name='gunrsass') and not (@name='gunhk416') and not (@name='gunIWItavorx95') and not (@name='gunIWIcarmel') and not (@name='gunauga3') and not (@name='gunl85a2') and not (@name='gunmdr556') and not (@name='gunrfb') and not (@name='gunmdr762') and not (@name='gunash12') and not (starts-with(@name, 'gunBow')) and not (starts-with(@name, 'gunBot')) and not ((contains(@name, 'gun')) and (contains(@name, 'Parts')))]
/items/item[(starts-with(@name, 'gun')) and not (starts-with(@name, 'gunBow')) and not (starts-with(@name, 'gunBot')) and not ((contains(@name, 'gun')) and (contains(@name, 'Parts')))]
